# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty operation.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

You can use this operation only once.



## Creating an Operation

- **init(userIdentityLookupInfos:)**: Creates an operation for generating share participants from the specified user data.
